title: The Time of Fever
overview: The story follows about two boys, Ho Tae and Dong Hee, who grow up together in Gangneung but are separated when Ho Tae moves to Seoul. After Dong Hee comes out to his family and is subsequently kicked out of his home, he finds refuge in Ho Tae's empty house. When Ho Tae returns to Gangneung for his father's funeral, the two reunite and begin living together, soon realizing that their feelings for each other have always gone beyond friendship or brotherhood.
